intros m k j x z Hinv Hsucc.
unfold cA at 1.
rewrite <- (A_L_B m k j x z Hinv Hsucc).
unfold cA at 1.
rewrite (cA_B m k x z Hinv Hsucc).
reflexivity.
Qed.
